website_summaries.verdict: The best air quality monitor with a few extra features to improve surrounding air quality.
pros: The built-in HEPA filter cleans airs to remove allergens and harmful particles
Compatible with Alexa for voice control and notifications
Can be monitored with the included app
cons: App and wireless features are limited with a difficult to use interface and connection process

customer_reviews.title: The smart, quiet and easy purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this air purifier! We just moved into an old house with our 18 month old. I can already tell the difference it is making to clear the air and old house smell! We currently have it in the babys room and it is super quiet which is very nice. The smart phone control capabilities and settings are a very nice feature to personalize it for our specific use. I am a chemist and I love that it is constantly measuring particulates to provide an air quality reading, very impressive. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a new purifier that is smart, quiet and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: LilBuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Great product, App and Alexa dont work very well though
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. App is kind of shaky and the Alexa integration doesnt work very well. It looks very modern and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a two weeks then stopped working. Also bought extended warranty but I never received it so I have not been able to return or have fixed. I am very disappointed. I am disabled and I thought Amazon would be a safe and easy way to purchase. It has been almost a year and I still trying to reach someone to deal with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly simple!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to help with allergy season. I was skeptical but it had good reviews....and for good reason! I now have three of these in my home. They are simple, easy to set up and the noise level is very low. Setting up WiFi was too easy....the push of a button! They work great, I haven't woken up feeling stuffy since I bought it! If you suffer from seasonal allergies, this product is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan pea

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate in purchasing - it's one heck of a great purifier.
customer_reviews.text: With 2-adults and 4-small dogs it's been difficult to find a quality purifier until we found the Germ Guardian. The room smells fantastic and on the auto setting it handles all the work for you. I strongly suggest the purchase of the GG products. This is an UNPAID endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: cespedeswyatt

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with how quiet this. I bought this specifically for work and I share an office with two other people. They like to listen to quiet music, and we talk with customers on the phone and I didn't want anything that would disturb them. You can barely hear this thing on low; if I don't tell them about it I doubt they'll realize I even have an air purifier in there.
customer_reviews.author: mybellegrooming

customer_reviews.title: Nice air purifier & good price.
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the product. Its very quiet. I haven't replaced either the filters or the UV blue, so I can't comment. I have two & they're working well to date.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air purifier
customer_reviews.text: This area fire is pretty cool gives you updates on your phone let you know the pollution level in your house I still have it it’s been about 3 years Still works great
customer_reviews.author: Romeel Lal

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions after one day
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for about 24 hours before malfunctioning. Yellow light continually flashes and manual does not address problem. This product is garbage and dysfunctional straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Max Power

customer_reviews.title: Great product crappy Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The bluetoooth part is crap so I don’t even bother with it but it does keep my room air clean and I can definitely notice a different in the air quality after using it
customer_reviews.author: Chad Staehr

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I bough Here in the L/A Calif
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I bough Here in the L/A Calif. area I have to change the filter every 50 to 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: blc

customer_reviews.title: Clean air
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the air amazingly. My daughters allergies are much better
customer_reviews.author: The ladies

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it makes a big difference. I have much less pet hair and dust. I would have given 5 stars but the filters are a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Ok but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet but it has a weird humming noise that is annoying. WiFi app is slow but it works, hopefully noise will work its way out or else I'll return
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: the air filter itself is good, but the connectivity features are a long way ...
customer_reviews.text: the air filter itself is good, but the connectivity features are a long way from ready. the app is very heavy on the phone in resources and the the alexa integration isn't there yet. you have to call it "gi gi" which is just weird, but the bigger issue is that it doesn't add as a smart home device so it can't be manipulated fully by the amazon platform.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This product comes & performs as advertised, in fact better than advertised. I instantly can tell the difference in the reduction of any bad smells from outside or when cooking... highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: UncleT

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten level implementation of Wi-Fi and BT
customer_reviews.text: Automation is ineffective. The Bluetooth and Wi-Fi are of such poor design that they’re rendered useless. Therefore no voice control through Alexa either. Really just a gimmick in my opinion. Nothing more than a sticker that says Wi-Fi/Bluetooth. Fake rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E Porter

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely noticed an improvement in the air quality in my home. When we cook heavy things I check to see if the unit is actually noticing and it always does. I like the WiFi aspect of this unit as well. I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: A must have product in any household especially busy cities ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have product in any household especially busy cities. Can tell the difference in the air quality when coming from outside.
customer_reviews.author: yitz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Got 2 for the house so far and they are a godsend. A++ would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice then broke
customer_reviews.text: Was working nice for two weeks, but now it won't turn on at all. I can't find any info on fixing it. What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Pursehouse

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: A must have in kids room. Located in my Newborns room. Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Xander K.M. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Night light
customer_reviews.text: It works great Just a little noisy at night and the lights is also a problem for me. Beside those two things is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Not for odor removal
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work as good as my Rowenta air purifier, this one always green but I can clearly smell odor. The app doesn't work. I feel this thing is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I use it for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! I use it for allergies , dust, mold, cleaner air overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just brought home my new born so I needed this
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is working much better than we expected. I purchased this to help my cat. He has a nice long list of allergies and he was having a rough time around the house due to house dust allergies. After letting this run for the last 2 weeks, I have seen a significant improvement with my cat and a noticeable difference in the air quality. I also drove about 40 miles away and turned off the purifier using my phone to test it out. It was in fact off when I arrived home. All features seem to be working properly and I had no problem setting up the purifier or the app.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Fan stopped working in a couple of years
customer_reviews.text: WiFi function is very nice but the fan stopped working after a few years .
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Love this air purifier
customer_reviews.text: Love this air purifier. I can already tell a difference in the air in my house. I like the auto feature so it determines how high the fan needs to work to clean the air. The best thing is that it is soooo quiet don't even know it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Walnsch

customer_reviews.title: helps me breath better at night
customer_reviews.text: Works well, helps me breath better at night. Very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's really amazing how good this is at keeping our apartment from smelling like a litterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Flores

customer_reviews.title: The unit works fine without it and it is quiet
customer_reviews.text: I deleted the app because it was using a lot of battery power even when not in use. The unit works fine without it and it is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: sewcialist

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in knowing
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the ability to see what the particulate rating is and the automatic feature raises and lowers the fan the fan when the rating changes. The fan is super quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Gledhill

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday and love it so far. Quite yet efficient. Help get rid of old house smell. App doesn't work quite well.

customer_reviews.title: Good filter. Poor app.
customer_reviews.text: The filter seems to work well. It's quiet. Easy to operate. Have no way to test its rating of air quality. The mobile app is horrible. Took almost 10 minutes to connect to the filter. Then, it wanted to do more setup and dropped the connection. It wouldn't connect to wifi (we have three routers to get strong signals anywhere in the house). Do NOT buy this for a smart home device.
customer_reviews.author: SteveC

customer_reviews.title: Love how quiet it is
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my classroom. Love how quiet it is!
customer_reviews.author: A+

customer_reviews.title: Won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived and would not even turn on. Amazing sending out a new one; fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: WeberFL

customer_reviews.title: Wifi and Bluetooth connectivity works great. Only thing was you had to enable locations ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Wifi and Bluetooth connectivity works great. Only thing was you had to enable locations services within the app before being able to connect for the first time
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Kopecky

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought is would suck up the pet hair more. I don't see in difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D.

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my daughter. It help with her allergies. And it has Wi-Fi. It was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: While the unit seems to work well. The package was opened and the unit was obviously used. The filter is not new.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made & stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Two months later is doesn't work. Very cheap and doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: CWD

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALEXA COMPATIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT connect to Alexa via app, wi-fi or other. It just uses your phone in lieu of a remote. The purifier is whisper quiet, but as far as performance, it is ok, but you can do much better for the price, especially by not paying for features that are wrongly advertised. I cannot recommend due to false features listed and performance is mediocre compared to similar machines.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have.....i have always had sinus issues which led to snoring....its annoying to the people who sleep next to u and its embarrassing....i clean often, i take the meds but still issues and snoring.....so i decided to buh this air purifier, got it, plugged it in and went to sleep....next day i woke up with a clear nos....ask my gf if i snored during the night and she couldnt remember hearing me snore so we recorded my next night's rest and no snoring and again i woke up with a clear noise.....i love this thing....some research said it kills allergens in the atmosphere that contribute to sinus issues....i am forever thankful for this thing
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Mapp

customer_reviews.title: The GermGuardian is amazing! We love that it is not as loud ...
customer_reviews.text: The GermGuardian is amazing! We love that it is not as loud as our other purifier but our favorite part is that it works with our phone as well as Alexa. The UV light is much smaller in this unit in comparison to our other purifier but I’m not really sure that it matters...just that it works. We have this particular item in our master bedroom so it is sufficient for that area. The air quality is measured and the fan has an automatic setting to accommodate this feature. Huge fan!
customer_reviews.author: Devanie

customer_reviews.title: Works great I can see the difference with the dust
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these now. Wifi setup is not to hard I did have issues on one unit but the other's worked just fine. After using these for awhile I can see the difference with dust specially in my office. My PC tower would collect a lot of dust and I would have to clean it a lot but now there's hardly any dust. Longer term desirability has yet to be determined I since I have only had the units for a few weeks. The app is not great but it works it needs to be updated to support the iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyShopper918

customer_reviews.title: like "Gary") to initiate a command
customer_reviews.text: Bought this primarily for the Alexa function. Quickly learn that it's all a gimmick and too cumbersome to use. You need to ask Alexa, to ask "Gi Gi" (with a hard "G", like "Gary") to initiate a command. From there, you need to know an array of long and complicated commands, word for word, that make it more of a nightmare to use; overall, I have yet to get it to work, nor plan on wasting anymore time on it. The WiFi app seems to work fine at the moment, but if you're considering this specific model for the Alexa functionality, you, like many others have reported, will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing I want 40 of them!!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I have this in my bedroom and the other day I was spraying some dry shampoo in my hair in the adjoining bathroom and it kicked on all by itself. The light turned RED it said like 546 parts per billion, kicked itself to level 5 air cleaning... I am SOOOO impressed in less than 4 minutes I was into an accceptable range. Wow... cant wait to get another for my living area. ALSO... reconsidering using that dry shampoo... LOL my allergies are way down since using this.
customer_reviews.author: PaintedGypsy

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad app/Alexa skill
customer_reviews.text: Nice little purifier. Got it primarily to replace a non smart home device. The app is fine and connects okay but the Guardian Technologies skill on Alexa is awful. Pointless commands that are way too long/complex to be used in a smart home. Cannot be recognized as a device in Alexa which is the real head scratcher... why would they make a smart home capable device that the Guardian Tech skill won’t let setup as device in Alexa??
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ralston

customer_reviews.title: WiFi functionality does not work - customer service fell through
customer_reviews.text: Called in to try and fix the blinking light on the top of this unit that would not stop. Customer service had not heard of this and wanted me to ship the unit to them to take a look at it. Never received any additional follow up after our call and never received replacement unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dohr

customer_reviews.title: I think it's malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: I am in the Bay Area where the air quality has been between 100-200 for over a week now. I bought two of these, one for each kids room. One seems to be working but the other one says the particulate matter is around 400 or 500. I checked the filters, vacuumed the carbon one and made sure the hepa filter was put in correctly, but it still says that. I have a hard time believing it because outside the air quality is around 200 right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the air is much better. My son
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this air purifier. The quality of the air is much better. My son, who has allergies BAD, has benefited from this in the first week. IT is very easy to connect to the wi-fi and with the app it is easy to monitor the hepa filter and when it should be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Terpstra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, this purifier has worked well, it's super easy to set up and super quiet!! Has many different levels and I love how you can connect via wifi to an app if you want. Overall it's been a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: A_Spence

customer_reviews.title: Fan stopped working on unit and replacement unit within a day
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and connects with Alexa. App is good too. Fan stopped working within 24 hrs so i returned it. They accidentally sent a lower model back, which I returned for this one. They sent the correct model but the fan stopped working again with 24 hours. Customer Service is friendly, but I don’t have the time or patience to keep returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth interface makes this otherwise good unit a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Good filtration, quiet operation, cool "tech look." But the Bluetooth interface on this unit is a joke -- unreliable, quirky, and a wasted feature given its poor operation.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thyme

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier with auto sensor !!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for an air purifier with all the bells and whistle then this one is for you! The auto feature is awesome my wife was cooking in the kitchen and the air purifier is in my living room.The kitchen got smoky and worked its way into the living room changing the greenlight to yellow to red and the fan speed climbed to 5! The air quality reading went from 03 to over 300 pm!! I took some pictures :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Clean air at home
customer_reviews.text: What a deal on Amazon. Waiting to order this product for a while when a co-workers told me about it. Very happy with my decision to pull the trigger. Great, easy instructions. Can move it from room to room if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Extraordinary Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Purifier
customer_reviews.text: My son suffers from terrible seasonal allergies. This purifier has some great benefits. He likes the fact that he can control purifier via his phone and see the air quality in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur~de~Lis

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older GermGuardian air purifier and it works great. I really like that I can control it from my phone. Would like it if it could connect to Google home as well.
customer_reviews.author: PersistantWelderChic

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: We used this air cleaner for a year and it just died! We have changed filters and taken good care of it! Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyAnnN

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Was hesitant on if the level reader was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . Was hesitant on if the level reader was accurate but after burning stuff on the stove sent smoke everywhere the Guardian picked it up and the levels were high.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Fart Guardian! Fighting the good fight!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air filter. It does everything it says it does, but I want to point out the one feature nobody wants to talk about... ODORS. And you know what they really mean is FARTS. Last night after driving for 8 hours and moving my son back from college I laid down to go to sleep and started farting up a storm, and I worried my fiance would come in to a gas filled room... NOPE! Not with the GermGuardian by my side! It literally sucked my farts from the air and turned them into freshness. I can now fart in peace. Thank you Germ Guardian. Or should I call you my Fart Guardian!
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Air Purifiers.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Surprisingly takes cooking odors out. You could see the ring light changing colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mian Majeed

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Works well other than the fact that I cannot get it to connect to WiFi. I have tried many, many times without any luck.
customer_reviews.author: Lilybet

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but it does not take all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but it does not take all the dust from the air. My stuff at my room still get dust, but I like that I can control from anywhere in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Cabanillas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I can control it with my phone and the air in my house is great
customer_reviews.author: Tazarchy

customer_reviews.title: she said it's great, not loud and compact enough to accommodate her ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughter for her dorm room.. she said it's great, not loud and compact enough to accommodate her small space!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Wife was concerned about the air quality in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wife was concerned about the air quality in our house. The item works great and can recirculate and clean the air in our living in minutes. It will however only connect to one device.
customer_reviews.author: T B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Since I’ve put it in my bedroom I have noticed a huge reduction in dust on my dark bedroom furniture and also helped with the dog smell from the dog bed that stays in my room. I will be ordering a second one for my sons room. I have had air cleaning machine in the past and they can’t even come close to being compared with this one. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: It's do what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with this purchase its helped with the cooking smell, freshing the air and I love the feature that you can control it from the phone by downloading there app
customer_reviews.author: Habib Abbas Nadom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly well and helps my boyfriend with his allergies!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: the "smart" part is kinda weak. a waste of money. just buy their "dumb" version. you are not losing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bell William

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to do. It's quiet and set up was easy. I've had this about 2 months now and allergies haven't been nearly as bad as before. Also haven't had to dust my tv stand as often.
customer_reviews.author: Reese B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple of weeks. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Won't even turn on manually. What a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: BootBabe

product_meta.title: Germ Guardian WiFi Bluetooth Smart Voice Control Air Purifier, UV Light Sanitizer Eliminates Germs, Mold,Odors,True HEPA Filters Allergies, Pollen, Smoke, Dust, Pet Dander, 22inch 4-in-1 CDAP4500BCA
product_meta.description:
BREATHE FRESH AND CLEANER AIR
GermGuardian air purifiers kill germs and viruses, filter odors, and trap allergens with a True HEPA filter and optional UV C light to deliver crisp, refreshing air to your home.

SMART CONTROL
As it is Alexa and Google compatible, you can change the settings of your air purifier through voice activation and control settings remotely using the Guardian Technologies App.

Made for medium to large rooms up to 167 sq. feet

WHY USE GENUINE GERMGUARDIAN FILTER REPLACEMENTS
Your purifier is only as powerful and effective as the filter you put inside, and our Genuine GermGuardian replacement parts are essential for maintaining product performance. Each filter or bulb is designed specifically for a particular unit style. Not only will genuine replacement parts fit like a glove, but they also have the combination technology to match so that you can get the most out of your air purifier.

AHAM VERIFIED
AHAM verified products are rated for their ability to clean tobacco smoke, dust, and pollen from rooms.

CADR RATING
Dust (107) Pollen (116) and Smoke (99)

5 YEAR WARRANTY
GermGuardian gives you reassurance and a US based tech support team with a 5 year limited warranty in addition to your purchase.

VOLTAGE
Plug the power cord into a 120V AC outlet.
feature_bullets: WIFI & BLUETOOTH ENABLED : Monitor and control your GermGuardian air purifier anywhere from the Guardian Technologies App that notifies you and sends important alerts

4 IN 1 AIR PURIFIER FOR HOME : True HEPA air filter reduces up to 99.97 percent of harmful germs, mold spores, and odor while utilizing a built in air quality monitor (AQM) that automatically adjusts speed to optimize room air quality
KILLS GERMS : UV-C light helps kill airborne viruses such as influenza, staph, rhinovirus, and works with Titanium Dioxide to reduce volatile organic compounds
TRAPS ALLERGENS : Pre filter traps dust, pet hair, and other large particles while extending the life of the HEPA filter
REDUCES ODORS : Activated charcoal filter helps to reduce unwanted odors from pets, smoke, cooking fumes, and more
ROOM SIZE : 22 inch purifier filters air 4x per hour at max speed in medium rooms up to 153 sq. feet; CADR RATING: Dust (107) Pollen (116) and Smoke (99)

GENUINE REPLACEMENTS : Only use Genuine GermGuardian replacement parts to maintain performance; Replace the filter every 6 to 8 months and the UV C bulb every 10 to 12 months; Filters: GermGuardian filter C (model FLT4825) or a 4 pack of GermGuardian carbon filters (model FLT22C84); UV C Bulb: Model LB4000
VOICE CONTROL : Alexa and Google compatible for convenient setting changes
SETTINGS Choose between 5 speed settings, auto mode for AQM, (quiet at lowest setting) and an optional UV C light
AHAM VERIFIED & ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED : This product was rated for its ability to filter tobacco smoke, dust, and pollen from rooms and be Energy Star Certified and CARB compliant

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
